name: Intellect
headline: A modern-day mental health company for Asia.
description:
Intellect is a modern-day mental health company on a mission to make mental healthcare & wellbeing support accessible for everyone in Asia.

Today, Intellect is the largest and fastest growing mental health tech company in Asia, serving over 2.5 million members and leading organisations globally through our mental health platform. Intellect was also selected as one of Google’s Best Apps of 2020.

Intellect is backed by leading investors including Insignia Ventures Partners, Y Combinator, and an extensive list of family offices, big tech executives & renowned angel investors.

founders.name: Theodoric Chew, Founder
founders.description: Theodoric is the co-founder & CEO of Intellect, a mental health company building a new mental healthcare system for Asia. Prior to founding Intellect, Theodoric led marketing and growth teams at various growth stage startups.

founders.name: Anurag Chutani, Founder
founders.description: Anurag Chutani is the co-founder & CTO of Intellect, a seasoned full-stack engineer with experience leading engineering teams from early to growth-stage startups including CARS24 and Wadi.

![](https://intellect.co)
# Redefining Mental Health Access and Quality
Empowering **the world’s largest organisations and 4 million members globally** with evidence-based and hyperlocalised mental health care, all in one ecosystem
[ Get Started ](https://intellect.co/</book-a-demo/>)
![](https://intellect.co)
# Elevating mental wellbeing for organisations and individuals
Evidence-based tools that bring the whole spectrum of mental wellbeing support under a single ecosystem:
![](https://intellect.co)
Self-care app and skill-building programmes
![](https://intellect.co)
Licensed psychologists and 24/7 EAP services
![](https://intellect.co)
Certified behavioural health coaches and counsellors
![](https://intellect.co)
Access to providers in 120+ languages and 100+ countries
[ Book a Demo ](https://intellect.co/</book-a-demo/>)
[ Our Products ](https://intellect.co/</our-products>)
# Trusted by Global Organisations
![](https://intellect.co)
![](https://intellect.co)
# Best-in-class Coverage, Support, and Speed
There is no one-size-fits-all solution to mental healthcare. We’ve created personalised mental health journeys that anyone can embark on to support both individual and organisational goals.
Coverage
Available in 120+ languages, Intellect’s comprehensive local network of providers are accessible in 100+ countries.
![](https://intellect.co)
Support
Dedicated client success managers for HR Teams spanning localised webinars, wellbeing analytics, and year-long support from organisational consultants.
![](https://intellect.co)
Speed
Access a 24/7 clinical helpline, utilise a suite of self-guided CBT-based programmes in your own time, and book providers within the next day.
![](https://intellect.co)
![](https://intellect.co)
![](https://intellect.co)
![](https://intellect.co)
[ Get Started ](https://intellect.co/</book-a-demo/>)
# Featured Globally In
![](https://intellect.co)
![](https://intellect.co)
![](https://intellect.co)
# Better Mental Health Benefits = Better Organisational Outcomes
Millions of employees worldwide struggle with mental health challenges, leading to loss of business productivity, high turnover rates, and absenteeism. Intellect enables organisations to tackle these barriers with cultural sensitivity and clinical efficacy in mind.
![](https://intellect.co)
### Team conflict & low connectedness
Poor team dynamics inhibit progress, innovation, and the achievement of goals
![](https://intellect.co)
### Lack of motivation & employee morale
Motivation issues hinder employee performance and lead to low employee morale
![](https://intellect.co)
### Decreased mood & wellbeing
Low mood and wellbeing is challenging to manage and impact people in both their work and personal lives
![](https://intellect.co)
### Low productivity & output
Low employee productivity negatively impacts businesses’ bottom lines
[ Book a Demo ](https://intellect.co/</book-a-demo/>)
[ For Businesses ](https://intellect.co/<https:/intellect.co/for-businesses/>)
# Meaningful and Measurable Change
Our clients see results from our tried-and-tested methodology, trusting Intellect’s rigorous and peer-reviewed approach in delivering services.
![](https://intellect.co)
### 35%
of all employees signed up for the Intellect app within the first year
![](https://intellect.co)
### 93%
of employees experienced a decrease in anxiety levels after 4-6 weeks of utilisation
![](https://intellect.co)
### 81%
of employees reported improved ability to regulate their emotions
![](https://intellect.co)
### 4.9/5
user satisfaction rating across 3 million registered app users
[ Book a Demo ](https://intellect.co/</book-a-demo/>)
[ Our Impact ](https://intellect.co/<https:/intellect.co/our-impact/>)
# Real People, Real Results
Global organisations use Intellect in their mental wellbeing journey.
Intellect has really played its part so I’m very comfortable in sharing that people who left due to mental stress or poor work life balance **improved tremendously by 16%**. Among those who use the Intellect app, we could see that the coaching element is such a strong feature of what Intellect offers. Many of those who have used the coaching services have been very vocal in sharing that the coaches that they have spoken to have really helped them in their personal journeys towards mental wellbeing.
![](https://intellect.co)
**— Lutfi Ghani** HR Director for Singapore and Malaysia
![](https://intellect.co)
Our commitment to employee wellbeing extends beyond simply providing assistance during challenging times.
Partnering with Intellect has enabled us to **provide proactive mental health support** , ensuring our employees have access to resources that will help them thrive professionally and personally. This collaboration reflects our dedication to fostering a culture of care and continuous support.
![](https://intellect.co)
**— Margaret Ching** VP HR and Learning & Development
![](https://intellect.co)
Intellect provided that bridge where you can download the app and do some pretty non-confrontational things like exercises and tips, while also making it easier to reach out if you want to talk to somebody.
It’s nice, from an HR point of view, to be able to say that **there’s support that’s already available** to you where you don’t have to make an appointment with a therapist somewhere else.
![](https://intellect.co)
**— Sze Foong** Head of Talent Development
![](https://intellect.co)
Stigma still exists and cultural factors sometimes come into play. Intellect was an easy application to use with all the different features. Intellect allows me to choose the coach in my own language and the personalisation around it. Depending on what you want, you’re able to design some of those journeys that follow the learning path and see good features around it.
![](https://intellect.co)
**— Anshul Joshi** Associate Director HR and DE&I Lead
![](https://intellect.co)
Intellect has changed the way we support employees’ wellbeing in the firm as it allows employees to address their wellbeing needs anytime, anywhere. Within the first two months of adoption, we’ve close to 30% of our APAC population onboard the app and using the content and online coaching services. It was great to also hear great feedback all round from our employees on the effectiveness of the coaching sessions, translating to strong results on our wellness scores in the pulse surveys.
![](https://intellect.co)
**— Daniel Tam** Head of HR Transformation
![](https://intellect.co)
Intellect has really played its part so I’m very comfortable in sharing that people who left due to mental stress or poor work life balance **improved tremendously by 16%**. Among those who use the Intellect app, we could see that the coaching element is such a strong feature of what Intellect offers. Many of those who have used the coaching services have been very vocal in sharing that the coaches that they have spoken to have really helped them in their personal journeys towards mental wellbeing.
![](https://intellect.co)
**— Lutfi Ghani** HR Director for Singapore and Malaysia

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Intellect**

Founded in 2020 and based in Singapore, Intellect aims to reshape mental health care accessibility across Asia. It has quickly become the largest and fastest-growing mental health tech company on the continent, now serving over 2.5 million members and collaborating with leading organizations through its comprehensive mental health platform. The company has garnered notable recognition, including being selected as one of Google’s Best Apps in 2020.

**Mission and Services**

Intellect’s mission is clear: to provide modern mental health care and well-being support for everyone in Asia. They focus on creating an ecosystem that delivers evidence-based mental health solutions tailored to the needs of each user. They cater primarily to businesses, offering a suite of services including:

- A self-care app and skill-building programs
- Access to licensed psychologists and 24/7 Employee Assistance Programs (EAP)
- Certified behavioral health coaches and counselors
- Mental health first aid training and clinics

Their innovative approach empowers users by providing direct, on-demand access to mental health support in over 120 languages and 100 countries.

**Growth and Impact**

Backed by investors like Insignia Ventures Partners and Y Combinator, Intellect has established a robust foundation for growth. With a dedicated team of about 30 employees, they have achieved impressive metrics:

- **35%** of employees in partnering organizations signed up for the app within the first year.
- **93%** reported reduced anxiety after using the platform for 4-6 weeks.
- An outstanding **4.9/5** user satisfaction rating from over 3 million app users illustrates the platform's effectiveness.

**Client Testimonials**

Users of Intellect provide compelling endorsements of the service's impact. HR professionals from various organizations have cited significant improvements in employee morale and reductions in mental stress-related turnover. They appreciate the app’s ease of use, the personalization of coaching, and the comprehensive support system that seamlessly integrates into their employees' lives.

**Conclusion**

Intellect stands at the forefront of mental health technology in Asia, making waves in how mental wellness is approached. By fostering a culture of care and continuous support, they are not only transforming individual lives but also enhancing organizational productivity and well-being. The extensive resources and solutions offered by Intellect reflect a true commitment to redefining mental health access, tailored to the diverse needs of Asia’s workforce. 

For more information, visit [Intellect's website](https://intellect.co).
